job_tasks.phrase: improving the current infrastructure landscape by automation
job_tasks.justification: Automation of infrastructure tasks falls under the umbrella of software development principles applied to infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: building and expanding (new) systems and platforms
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the creation and development of new systems and platforms, which is a core software development activity.
Modifying and improving existing systems and platforms is a key aspect of software development and maintenance.
The focus on 'operations' and maintaining systems points towards operational engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: carrying out life cycle management of systems and software
job_tasks.justification: Life cycle management of systems and software, particularly in an infrastructure context, aligns with operations engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: work with Delivery & contract managers, Product Owners and Project managers

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional infrastructure, automation, and operational tasks within a Linux team. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies, making it irrelevant to the GenAI Engineer profile.
